title.rendered: Airbus Group India Private Limited partners with Smile Foundation to provide healthcare services to the underprivileged and poor population

content.rendered:
Airbus Group India Private Limited partners with Smile Foundation to provide healthcare services to the underprivileged and poor population

 

Airbus Group has partnered with Smile Foundation in 2016 to provide primary healthcare services to the disadvantaged population of the national capital, Delhi. With their support, Smile Foundation is providing a wide range of preventive, promotive and curative health services across 20 slums of North Delhi under the Smile on Wheels programme. Jahangirpuri, Lal Bagh, JJ Colony, Outram Lane, Prembadi, Udham Singh Park and Shaheed Sukhdev Nagar are some of the targeted areas under this project. So far approx. 30000 beneficiaries have been benefitted from the project.

Airbus Group has reliably supported the growth of the Indian civil aviation sector, as well as the modernization of its armed forces, for over 50 years. India is an important engineering and research & technology hub for the Group, and has become an integral part of its global supply chain.
